name: Buttery Crab and Artichoke Dip
author: Idahoan
summary: Buttery Crab and Artichoke Dip is a great, gourmet-style appetizer that is sure to turn heads at your gathering. This recipe melds our Roasted Garlic and Parmesan Baby Reds® potatoes with crab, artichoke and a variety of cheeses.
ingredients: 1 (4.1 ounce) package Idahoan® Roasted Garlic & Parmesan Baby Reds
2 (15 ounce) cans water packed artichoke hearts
1 cup Brie cheese, broken into chunks
directions: Add all ingredients in a large mixing bowl and fold carefully
Use the water from the canned artichokes along with the boiling water
Place in a 9 x 12 baking dish that has been sprayed with olive oil
Bake until bubbling and golden brown
